## Matrix4x4.rotationX() method

Creates a Matrix4x4 which presents a rotation around the x axis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static rotationX(angle: number, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  angle | number | The rotate angle in radians. |
|  result | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix. if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix
